Stanza 1:
Vara vara thAn adikkadi nerukkadi kodukkira kAdhal kadankAri-adi
m1p  p d  d    dp p  p  p m1 m1m1 m1g g  g  gp p   p m1 m1m1 m1g

ulagil evaLum unnai pol illaiyE azhagiya kolaikAri
gp p   pm1m1  m1g   g   g r2 r2 r2g m1g  r2m1 gr2g

kuLir nilavinai neruppAi ninaikkira karuppA nee oru asadanada-ada
m1p   p d d d   d p  p   p m1  m1m1 m1g  g  gp  pp  pm1m1m1m1 m1g

unakkena uyil nAn ezhudhiya vayal dhAn nee idhai anubavidA
gp  p p  pm1  m1  m1g g  g  g r2  r2   r2g m1g   r2m1gr2g

ayyO ammA nee pollAdha rAkshasi Endi en kaRpOdu mOdhugirAi
n3S  n3S  n3  S  S S   Sn3R2Sn3 d n3 d  n3 n3n3 mdn3 n3S

nAnA unai vAvendru koovinEn neeyAi vandhennai En vAttugirAi
n3S  n3n3 S S   S  Sn3R2Sn3 d  n3  d  n3  n3  n3 md n3n3S

uyir vidaCHonnAl uyir vidugindrEn

unai vidaCHonnAl unai vidamAttEn
pSn  d p m1  m1  m1dp m1g r2 r2p

irudhivaraikkum iruppavan endru
pp d  p pm1 m1  pp  d p   pm1m1

uRudhiyai thandhu udharuvadhEn

oh thaviTHadhu pOdhum thanimayil ennai
p  m1 p m1 g   g g    g  m1g r2  r2r2

irukka vidu ennai irukka vidu

VarugirAi..

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
Vidai koduthEn vidu vidu vilagidu
dhinam dhinam enai En thurathugirAi
adi idhaya kadhavai izhuthay adaithEn
edharkadhai thattugirAi

Vanga kadarkaRai maNalil
madiyinil kidandha nAtkaL marandhAcha
uyir kAdhalai vaLarthu pEsiya pEchu
kAthila paRandhAcha

Edho Edho nAn Edhaydho pEsinEn
thoondil nee pOttAi nAn mAtinEn
indru nAn vidudhalai adaindhavan
appAda en sumaigaLai iRakkinEn

Thazhividum imaiyai thanakoru sumaiyai
ninaikindra vizhidhAn kadhaiyilum illaiyay
kadalendru ninaithu kalakindra nadhikku
unai indri inee uRuthuNai ilaiyay

Oh kAdhal seidhEn nAn kAdhal seidhEn
maRakka vidu unnai maRakka vidu
maRakka vidu anbe maRandhu vidu
maraka vidu
